messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

poor quality network audio video network cable and floor sent tuesday november urgent poor quality audio video cable floor importance high dear we experiencing very poor quality audio video cable floor location can we please have your help improving experience affecting with our client image thank you best regards agile manager next annual leave november december

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Ticket**

I need to categorize this IT ticket into one of the predefined categories: "Hardware," "HR Support," "Access," "Miscellaneous," "Storage," "Purchase," "Internal Project," or "Administrative rights." The ticket discusses poor quality audio and video, network issues, and urgency related to cabling. It seems more focused on improving the audio/video experience, so it likely fits into "Hardware" due to the mention of AV equipment and cables. However, it could also be seen as "Miscellaneous" or "Internal Project."**Categorizing IT Ticket**

The ticket mentions "network audio video," which suggests it relates to hardware, even though there's no separate "Networking" category. Also, it seems to be more of a support request because of the poor AV quality. I think categorizing it as "Hardware" is the best option. We need to respond with a structured JSON format, specifically: {"category":"Hardware"}. I should keep it straightforward and only provide this JSON snippet for clarity.
